product_name: FCS Adjustable Dayrunner Stand Up Paddleboard Bag - Wide
long_description: Designed for boards up to 35.5 in. wide and 10 ft. 6in. - 12 ft. long, the wide FCS Adjustable Dayrunner Stand Up Paddleboard Bag protects your SUP from dings and scratches.
short_description: Designed for boards up to 35.5 in. wide and 10 ft. 6in. - 12 ft. long, the wide FCS Adjustable Dayrunner Stand Up Paddleboard Bag protects your SUP from dings and scratches.
